title: Lomani By Lomani For Men, Eau De Toilette Spray, 3.3-Ounce Bottle
description: Launched by the design house of Lomani in 1987, LOMANI is a men's fragrance that possesses a blend of crisp citrus, spice and wood, very refreshing.  It is recommended for casual wear.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Natures Cure Body Acne Treatment Spray 3.5 Oz
description: 2% Salicylic Acid. Dermatologist tested. Nature's Care Body Acne Treatment Spray clears and prevents acne on your back, chest, neck and arms. The maximum strength 2% Salicylic Acid Formula comes in a specially designed pump that sprays from any angle, even upside down, to treat acne in those hard-to-reach places - even the middle of the back. It fights body acne that can be caused by sweating and frictions from athletic gear and clothing. The non-staining spray penetrates pores to eliminate most acne pimples and contains moisturizing botanicals that help soothe skin. The spray can be used all over your body.
